author: Phred Dvorak, Amira El-Fekki
title: Global Cases Approach One Million, U.S. Weighs Grounding Domestic Flights - The Wall Street Journal
description: Global Cases Approach One Million, U.S. Weighs Grounding Domestic Flights The Wall Street Journal
content: Some of the last openings for travel across borders are closing, as the number of reported cases of the new coronavirus world-wide approaches one million.President Trump said Wednesday that he was considering grounding flights to and from U.S. cities that are… [+7171 chars]
